data.description:
Our Virtual Reality Interview Skills training package is designed to help candidates seeking employment significantly elevate their interview skills. This immersive VR training provides a hands-on experience for mastering interview techniques while building self confidence in the process. Participants can explore the VR environment at their own pace and engage in one-on-one conversations or formal panel interviews. 
A comprehensive pre-interview checklist initiates the process, guiding participants through crucial preparation steps. This tool prepares candidates for real-life job interviews. Real-time feedback and auditory cues foster a continuous learning environment, and the ability to revisit the VR interview simulation reinforces the learning process.

Key Features and Learning Objectives:
•Two Interview Styles: Practice both informal interviews with one person and formal interview scenarios with two people.
•Realistic Interactions: The simulation incorporates a realistic question-and-answer flow that emulates real-world interviews. 
•Expertly Crafted Content: Material researched and designed by subject matter experts.
•Embedded Learning Objectives: Ensures participants can recall, understand, and apply the necessary skills for successful real-life interviews. 
•Seamless Navigation: Hand-tracking and voice-to-text are the primary navigation methods.
